verses.verse: And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that on <WG1722> one <WG3391> of those <WG1565> days <WG2250>, as he <WG846> taught <WG1321> <WG5723> the people <WG2992> in <WG1722> the temple <WG2411>, and <WG2532> preached the gospel <WG2097> <WG5734>, the chief Kohanim <WG749> and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122> came upon <WG2186> <WG5627> him with <WG4862> the elders <WG4245>,

And <WG2532> again <WG4369> <WG5639> he sent <WG3992> <WG5658> a third <WG5154>: and <WG1161> they wounded <WG5135> <WG5660> him <WG5126> also <WG2532>, and cast him out <WG1544> <WG5627>.

But <WG1161> when the husbandmen <WG1092> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> him <WG846>, they reasoned <WG1260> <WG5711> among <WG4314> themselves <WG1438>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, This <WG3778> is <WG2076> <WG5748> the heir <WG2818>: come <WG1205> <WG5773>, let us kill <WG615> <WG5725> him <WG846>, that <WG2443> the inheritance <WG2817> may be <WG1096> <WG5638> ours <WG2257>.

So <WG2532> they cast <WG1544> <WG5631> him <WG846> out of <WG1854> the vineyard <WG290>, and killed <WG615> <WG5656> him. What <WG5101> therefore <WG3767> shall <WG4160> the lord <WG2962> of the vineyard <WG290> do <WG4160> <WG5692> unto them <WG846>?

He shall come <WG2064> <WG5695> and <WG2532> destroy <WG622> <WG5692> these <WG5128> husbandmen <WG1092>, and <WG2532> shall give <WG1325> <WG5692> the vineyard <WG290> to others <WG243>. And <WG2532> they watched <WG3906> <WG5660> him, and sent forth <WG649> <WG5656> spies <WG1455>, which should feign <WG5271> <WG5740> <WG1511> <WG5750> themselves <WG1438> just men <WG1342>, that <WG2443> they might take hold <WG1949> <WG5638> of his <WG846> words <WG3056>, that so <WG1519> they might deliver <WG3860> <WG5629> him <WG846> unto the power <WG746> and <WG2532> authority <WG1849> of the governor <WG2232>.

And <WG2532> they asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Master <WG1320>, we know <WG1492> <WG5758> that <WG3754> thou sayest <WG3004> <WG5719> and <WG2532> teachest <WG1321> <WG5719> rightly <WG3723>, <WG2532> neither <WG3756> acceptest thou <WG2983> <WG5719> the person <WG4383> of any, but <WG235> teachest <WG1321> <WG5719> the way <WG3598> of 'Elohim <WG2316> truly <WG225> <WG1909>:
Is it Torahful <WG1832> <WG5748> for us <WG2254> to give <WG1325> <WG5629> tribute <WG5411> unto Caesar <WG2541>, or <WG2228> no <WG3756>?
But <WG1161> he perceived <WG2657> <WG5660> their <WG846> craftiness <WG3834>, and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> tempt ye <WG3985> <WG5719> me <WG3165>?

Shew <WG1925> <WG5657> me <WG3427> a penny <WG1220>. Whose <WG5101> image <WG1504> and <WG2532> superscription <WG1923> hath it <WG2192> <WG5719>? They answered <WG611> <WG5679> and <WG1161> said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Caesar's <WG2541>.

And <WG1161> he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Render <WG591> <WG5628> therefore <WG5106> unto Caesar <WG2541> the things which be <WG3588> Caesar's <WG2541>, and <WG2532> unto 'Elohim <WG2316> the things which be <WG3588> 'Elohim's <WG2316>.

Then <WG1161> came <WG4334> <WG5631> to him certain <WG5100> of the TZ'dukim <WG4523>, which <WG3588> deny <WG483> <WG5723> that there is <WG1511> <WG5750> any <WG3361> resurrection <WG386>; and they asked <WG1905> <WG5656> him <WG846>,

Saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Master <WG1320>, Mosheh <WG3475> wrote <WG1125> <WG5656> unto us <WG2254>, If <WG1437> any man's <WG5100> brother <WG80> die <WG599> <WG5632>, having <WG2192> <WG5723> a wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> he <WG3778> die <WG599> <WG5632> without children <WG815>, that <WG2443> his <WG846> brother <WG80> should take <WG2983> <WG5632> his wife <WG1135>, and <WG2532> raise up <WG1817> <WG5661> seed <WG4690> unto his <WG846> brother <WG80>.

<WG1161> Last <WG5305> of all <WG3956> the woman <WG1135> died <WG599> <WG5627> also <WG2532>.

Therefore <WG3767> in <WG1722> the resurrection <WG386> whose <WG5101> wife <WG1135> of them <WG846> is she <WG1096> <WG5736>? for <WG1063> seven <WG2033> had <WG2192> <WG5627> her <WG846> to wife <WG1135>.

Neither <WG3777> <WG1063> can <WG1410> <WG5736> they die <WG599> <WG5629> any more <WG2089>: for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> <WG5748> equal unto the angels <WG2465>; and <WG2532> are <WG1526> <WG5748> the children <WG5207> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, being <WG5607> <WG5752> the children <WG5207> of the resurrection <WG386>.
